question: You recently went to a concert and thought one of the singers was very good. You want to tell him how you feel.Write a letter to the singer. In your lettersay how you feel about his performancegive details of your musical activitiesexplain how you would like him to help you with your musical activities
text: I am writing this letter in order to tell you how amazed I felt after going to one of your concerts last Saturday in Ottawa.

Let me start by mentioning that during the concert, I could feel a strong emotion and dedication of you when you were singing your songs. In addition, you had shown an exceptional stage performance throughout your whole performance, which is quite rare to see.

I am saying such a thing because I have been going to many concerts for the past two years, and I am intending to pursue a professional career as a back vocal. I have been taking singing classes for this purpose for quite a while, and I hope it will happen in a near future.

With regards to this career, I would like to kindly ask if you know any musician or band who are looking for a back vocal, I would be grateful if you could referee me. Finally, if you have any piece of advice for someone who wants to follow this path, I would appreciate it, as well.
Thank you for your time and consideration.
